sentence: yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ tathāvādinā bhikkhunā akat'ānudhammena taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhena saddhiṃ sambhuñjeyya vā saṃvaseyya vā saha vā seyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ tathāvādinā bhikkhunā akat'ānudhammena taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhena saddhiṃ sambhuñjeyya vā saṃvaseyya vā saha vā seyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
meaning: with (a monk) who has such a view

sentence: yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ tathāvādinā bhikkhunā akat'ānudhammena taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhena saddhiṃ sambhuñjeyya vā saṃvaseyya vā saha vā seyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ tathāvādinā bhikkhunā akat'ānudhammena taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhena saddhiṃ sambhuñjeyya vā saṃvaseyya vā saha vā seyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
meaning: (by a monk) who has not completed the legal procedure; not dealt with according to the rule
lit. meaning: by not done according to dhamma

sentence: yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ tathāvādinā bhikkhunā akata-anudhammena taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhena saddhiṃ sambhuñjeyya vā saṃvaseyya vā saha vā seyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ tathāvādinā bhikkhunā akata-anudhammena taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhena saddhiṃ sambhuñjeyya vā saṃvaseyya vā saha vā seyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ tathāvādinā bhikkhunā akat'ānudhammena taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhena saddhiṃ sambhuñjeyya vā saṃvaseyya vā saha vā seyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ tathāvādinā bhikkhunā akat'ānudhammena taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhena saddhiṃ sambhuñjeyya vā saṃvaseyya vā saha vā seyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
meaning: by (a monk who has) not relinquished

sentence: yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ tathāvādinā bhikkhunā akat'ānudhammena taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhena saddhiṃ sambhuñjeyya vā saṃvaseyya vā saha vā seyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ tathāvādinā bhikkhunā akat'ānudhammena taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhena saddhiṃ sambhuñjeyya vā saṃvaseyya vā saha vā seyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ tathāvādinā bhikkhunā akat'ānudhammena taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhena saddhiṃ sambhuñjeyya vā saṃvaseyya vā saha vā seyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
